data: The Chevalier Tannhäuser, having lighted off his horse, stood doubtfully for a moment beneath the ombre gateway of the Venusberg, troubled with an exquisite fear lest a day’s travel should have too cruelly undone the laboured niceness of his dress.
The Story of Venus and Tannhäuser: A Romantic Novel
